column4: a noobs question: im running a 32 bit ubuntu, but just find out that my computer has an AMD Processor with "width" 64, am i wasting my ressources and should install a64 Ubuntu?
i got 4 GB Ram , using for GameProgramming (Blender)
Thanks, so i dont really need 64, i also read from issues with 64 bit, i'll will stay on my system. Yes there are 64 Builds for blender
